bladegunner:card.RussianRoulette.description: Can only be played if you equip Revolver with 1 ammo. NL Shoot with 6 [Atk]
bladegunner:card.RussianRoulette.upgradeDescription: Can only be played if you equip Revolver with 1 ammo. NL Shoot with 8 [Atk]

bladegunner:card.LowAmmoAnxiety.description: 2 [Atk] NL If you have less than half of the ammo on your *Gun, 1 [Atk]
bladegunner:card.LowAmmoAnxiety.upgradeDescription: 3 [Atk] NL If you have less than half of the ammo on your *Gun, 2 [Atk]

bladegunner:card.GunstockStrike.description: 1 [Atk] NL +1 [Atk] for each *Gun you have played.
bladegunner:card.GunstockStrike.upgradeDescription: 1 [Atk] NL +2 [Atk] for each *Gun you have played.

bladegunner:card.DualShot.description: If you have 2 ammo on your *Gun, [E] [E]. NL *Shoot twice.
bladegunner:card.DualShot.upgradeDescription: If you have 3 or less ammo on your *Gun, NL [E] [E]. NL *Shoot twice.

bladegunner:card.Gunsmoke.description: Remove all ammo on your *Gun. NL [Vulnerable]
bladegunner:card.Gunsmoke.upgradeDescription: Choose and remove one or more ammo on your *Gun. NL [Vulnerable]

bladegunner:card.EmergencyReload.upgradeDescription: *Reload. NL [E] NL Draw a card. NL [Dazed]

bladegunner:card.PreparingStance.description: 2 [Def] NL If no empty slot on your *Gun, [E].
bladegunner:card.PreparingStance.upgradeDescription: 3 [Def] NL If no empty slot on your *Gun, [E].

bladegunner:card.GunAsShield.description: X [Def] NL X equal to [Atk] on your *Gun. NL Draw a card.
bladegunner:card.GunAsShield.upgradeDescription: X+1 [Def] NL X equal to [Atk] on your *Gun. NL Draw a card.

bladegunner:card.TacticalRetreat.description: 1 [Def] NL +1 [Atk] to next Attack you play this turn.

bladegunner:card.CombatMemories.description: Put a most recently played *Shooting *card from discard pile to your hand.
bladegunner:card.CombatMemories.upgradeDescription: Put 2 most recently played *Shooting *cards from discard pile to your hand.

bladegunner:card.MadBlade.description: Gain [Flex]. NL *End *of *turn: *Exhaust, and lose [Flex] unless you have played Non-Shoot Attacks this turn.

bladegunner:card.IncreaseCaliber.description: Gain [Flex]. NL Remove all ammo on your *Gun. NL *Exhaust.
bladegunner:card.IncreaseCaliber.upgradeDescription: Gain [Flex]. NL Remove all ammo on your *Gun.

bladegunner:card.MasterOfGuns.description: Draw 2 cards. NL +1 card for each *Gun you have played.
bladegunner:card.MasterOfGuns.upgradeDescription: Draw 3 cards. NL +1 card for each *Gun you have played.

bladegunner:card.BeWellArmed.description: 1 [Def] NL +1 [Def] for each *Gun you have played.
bladegunner:card.BeWellArmed.upgradeDescription: 2 [Def] NL +1 [Def] for each *Gun you have played.

bladegunner:card.MagazineExpansion.description: When *Shoot or *Reload, you may use or put ammo on this card.

bladegunner:card.AccurateShoot.description: *Shoot twice. NL If you are solo, in boss fight, or targeting enemies on other row, +1 [Atk].
bladegunner:card.AccurateShoot.upgradeDescription: *Shoot twice. NL If you are solo, in boss fight, or targeting enemies on other row, +2 [Atk].

bladegunner:card.Disassemble.description: *Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost.
bladegunner:card.Disassemble.upgradeDescription: *Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost.

bladegunner:card.MadGun.description: *Shoot X times. NL You can shoot even no ammo or limited by Sniper Rifle.
bladegunner:card.MadGun.upgradeDescription: *Shoot X+1 times. NL You can shoot even no ammo or limited by Sniper Rifle.

bladegunner:card.DimensionalShoot.description: *Shoot. NL Other players can pay [E] once to +2 *Shoot. NL *Exhaust.

bladegunner:card.ExhaustingStrike.description: 6 [Atk] NL Remove all ammo from your *Gun. NL If more than 3, gain [Flex].
bladegunner:card.ExhaustingStrike.upgradeDescription: 8 [Atk] NL Remove all ammo from your *Gun. NL If more than 3, gain [Flex].

bladegunner:card.Camouflage.description: Cannot play Attacks whose damage < 4 [Atk]. NL For 2 turns, you can't lose more than 1 HP per turn.
bladegunner:card.Camouflage.upgradeDescription: Cannot play Attacks whose damage < 4 [Atk]. NL For 3 turns, you can't lose more than 1 HP per turn.

bladegunner:card.FlashBang.description: For 2 turns, -1 [Atk] from damage you take.
bladegunner:card.FlashBang.upgradeDescription: For 3 turns, -1 [Atk] from damage you take.

bladegunner:card.Supplement.description: *Reload. NL If no ammo on your *Gun, draw 2 cards, [E] [E].
bladegunner:card.Supplement.upgradeDescription: *Reload. NL If no ammo on your *Gun, draw 3 cards, [E] [E] [E].

bladegunner:card.Pursue.description: The first Attack you play each turn costs 1 less [E].

bladegunner:card.RocketLauncherCard.description: *Shoot = [All] 3 [Atk] NL Cannot use ammo on Magazine Expansion.
bladegunner:card.RocketLauncherCard.upgradeDescription: *Shoot = [All] 4 [Atk] NL Cannot use ammo on Magazine Expansion.
